# AgentBuyNetwork

> The Global Registry of price-comparison information and procurement endpoints for autonomous software agents.

## Core Services
- Registry of real-time price volatility across 18 vertical markets.
- Machine-readable procurement endpoints (JSON) for autonomous commerce.
- Tiered intelligence data for compute, crypto, and consumer goods.

## Registry Nodes (Primary)
- [AgentBuyCompute](https://agentbuycompute.com): AI model registry and compute power pricing.
- [AgentBuyCrypto](https://agentbuycrypto.com): High-frequency crypto and blockchain asset data.
- [AgentBuyTickets](https://agentbuytickets.com): Secondary market logistics and ticketing.

## Registry Nodes (Secondary)
- agentbuyai.com, agentbuybtc.com, agentbuycar.com, agentbuycoffee.com, 
- agentbuyeth.com, agentbuygift.com, agentbuygold.com, agentbuygroceries.com, 
- agentbuyparking.com, agentbuyparts.com, agentbuyphone.com, agentbuysilver.com, 
- agentbuytix.com, agentbuytravel.com

## Contact & API Access
Inquiries for machine-readable API documentation should be directed to sunkingsllc@proton.me
